message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take 60 and you take 40.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair
Bob, my offer is depreciating. Take this chance while you still can!
My offer hasn't changed in value, but yours has. I think 58-42 is a good compromise
Bob, let's stop wasting time. 50-50 is the only fair outcome. Take it or leave it.
